title: Over
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 24 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR110L
description: Students follow along as a little dog jumps over everything in its path. The dog jumps over a log, a hole, a bat, and more. Lighthearted illustrations accompany a text, with repeated language patterns to make decoding easier.
reviewWords: ball, bat, bike, cat, doll, hole, log, pot
phonics: Long Vowels : Associate the letter Oo with the long /o/ sound
grammar: Capitalization and Punctuation                : Recognize capital letters and periods in print
wordWork: Position Words                : Understand words associated with position
